title.narrative: Increasing the Member Loyalty while setting a pace for Expansion and Growth

description.narrative:
In the last year,Imenti Sacco has shown both potential and also great willingness to invest in farmers. The Agricultural loans increased from less than 5% to about 25% of total new loans given out in the year.Membership grew by over 1400 members and deposits from the new members increased by KES 6Million. In the same period,the Sacco developed a medium term loan products specifically for dairy farmers. The current year will therefore focus on increasing the uptake of this product, capitalizing the existing membership and creating member loyalty by increasing value. Additionally,the Imenti is setting itself on an expansion trajectory from the current region to other regions in Meru County.This will therefore require the Sacco to Rebrand and get a universal name hence enabling them venture into other markets in the area.
Develop a financial Literacy pragram for the existing Members especially farmers Organize a Youth Stakeholders event Train the youth in preparation for the Youth Council Develop a Youth Policy Staff training: Member loyalty,acquisition and win-back Establish atleast 4 Agency banks, half of which will be located in the primary cooperatives Hold atleast 3 regional workshops on use of Agency Banks Training the Agents on use of the Agency services Risk Management training for the Board: Control Under environment of uncertainty Rebranding of the SACCO and repositioning for Expansion in the region Review of the different Loan products, default and growth per product Train the internal Auditor on the use of KPI/Dashboard as a key management tool Review the Strategic Plan Exchange visit to Mumberes Dairy Follow-up Supervisory Board Workshop
The project is focused on enabling the Sacco to capitalize the existing members by offering more medium term loans to dairy farmers and primary cooperatives in Meru Region.
